title: Ep. 366 - Media Wages War Against Whistleblower
description:
The media has decided that punishing whistleblowers is okay -- as long as it's someone who blew the whistle on their own corruption. Also, a video goes viral showing the many heresies and blasphemies of President Trump's "faith advisor." And Hollywood has gone from remaking movies to remaking people. Date: 11-07-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
